ing: 1 cup winter squash seeds, rinsed clean and patted dry
1 tablespoon cayenne pepper sauce (such as Frank'sÂ® RedHotÂ®)
n: Roasted Winter Squash Seeds Buffalo Hot Wings-Style
des: "Pumpkins aren't the only squash varietals to yield tasty seeds for roasting! Next time you prepare butternut or acorn squash, save the seeds and have yourself a nutritious little snack."
ins:
Preheat oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
Stir seeds, butter, and cayenne pepper sauce together in a bowl to coat the seeds completely; spread onto prepared baking sheet.
Roast seeds to desired crispness, 30 to 45 minutes; cool completely on baking sheet before serving.
